newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-WILTORD TRANSFER TO DEPORTIVO IN DOUBT.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-WILTORD TRANSFER TO DEPORTIVO IN DOUBT.

text.p: French striker Sylvian Wiltord's transfer to Deportivo La Coruna may have to be cancelled, said the Spanish Football Federation on Thursday.
The federation said it had recived a communication from its French counterparts advising that Wiltord was still under contract to his former club Rennes until June 30, 1998.
Deportivo apparently bought the French player for 500 million pesetas ($3.3 million) earlier this month.
